ActFinancial Administration Act
PrecisEnactment of the CERTAIN TAXPAYERS REMISSION ORDER, 2003-1 which remits amounts payable under the Income Tax Act resulting from the disallowance of the deduction from income of pension contributions made in respect of the purchase of non-existent service, as provided for under the Memorial University of Newfoundland Pension Plan.
RegistrationRegistration: SI/ 2003-0123 Publication Date: 2003-07-02
